name: Patrolmech 2121
description:
In the year 2121, you are tasked with patrolling the grounds of a high-tech prison. Find the prisoners and prevent them from escaping.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - aim spotlight
  • Right click (held) - call for the drone pickup of a prisoner (make sure you point it at them long enough for the drone to pick them up)
  • Space - Advance dialog

(Note that the level won't end until you've captured all prisoners -- they sometimes give up behind a wall, so make sure to shine the light behind the walls and check them if you think you've caught everyone and the level's not advancing)
